full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for -80 Freezer**
=====================================

**Procurement Reference Number:** cb-8172-45129582

**Publication Date:** August 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 30, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of a -80 Freezer under the PWGSC Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts, Accessories, Services and Suppliers.

**Contract Period:**

* **Expected Start Date:** September 15, 2023
* **Expected End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Contract Value:**

The evaluation criteria for this contract will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Service Location:**

The service location for this contract is Ottawa, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will be required to provide a -80 Freezer that meets the requirements specified in the attached notice. The Contractor shall deliver the equipment to the CW vigil Pick-up location in Ottawa, Ontario.

**How to Submit a Proposal:**

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada website, CANADABUYS.

**Vendor Contact:**

For further information regarding this project, please contact:

Franky To
franky.to@inspection.gc.ca
(343) 548-6389

**Document:** [Download the tender notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8172/2024-00133-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf)

**Language:**

The language of this tender is English, but the bidder may submit their proposal in either English or French.

**Procurement Category:**

This tender falls under the Health category, specifically for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment.

**Industry Code:**

* UNSPSC 24131600: Industrial freezers
* UNSPSC 24131603: Low temperature freezers
